author: akarasulu
msg: Created new base class for isolating common logic to handling requests that have
single responses to requests.  This should work with all subtypes and impls of
the SingleReplyRequest interface minus the ExtendedRequest/Response pair which
is a bit different since it does not contain a target DN to work with.
This base class predominantly handles referral processing for the time being so
the subtype need not replicate this logic.  It also provides some basic

author: stack
msg: HBASE-793 HTable.getStartKeys() ignores table names when matching columns

author: scheu
msg: Added trace to ensure that the event returned from "parser.next()" is the same event that is returned by
the parser's current event.  If these don't match, then the parser is in a bad state.  Thus this trace information
is useful for identifying problems in the underlying parser.
